title: Pentagram EAT Seasonal
content:
Hello,

I already spent an hour browsing similar typefaces, but it seems I just can't find a perfect match.  
As I think I won't be able to get any work done till if find an answer it would be nice if someone here could help...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131024011052im_/http:/typophile.com/files/spring-lo_4442.jpg)

[more images](http://web.archive.org/web/20131024011052/http:/pentagram.com/blog/2007/07/new-work-eat-seasonal.php)
author: laurent

comments.content:
I can swear the S was different this morning.  
I need a shrink.

edit : Oh, and uhm... Thanks. Sorry.
